caption.p: (a) Analysis of inhibition of virus-receptor binding by BLI. Real-time kinetic analysis of virus binding to LAMP1 was performed by BLI. A representative experiment of concentration-dependent inhibition of virus binding by 15 is shown as determined by the BLI wavelength shift. (b) Inhibition curves of compounds from left to right, 14 (blue), 15 (red, obstructed by 14), 18 (purple), 12 (green), 17 (yellow), 10 (orange), 8 (brown), and 7 (light purple), of the virus-receptor binding determined similarly as shown in (a).
